Credits

  • this project is powered by reveal.js, an awesome project by Hakim El Hattab
  • and it is based on and inspired by reveal-jekyll by Thomas Friese
  • it uses the Github ribbon by Simon Whitaker

What is reveal.js?

  • a HTML presentation framework
  • allows to show beautiful presentations directly in the browser
  • HTML based, with support for Markdown
  • check the website with a demo in the header

reveal.js Github Demos

  • Animation: original
  • Backgrounds: original
  • Layout helpers: original
  • Markdown: original
  • Math: original
  • Media: original
  • Transitions: original

What is reveal-jekyll?

  • based on reveal.js
  • combines it with Jekyll and Github Pages to allow hosting an online presentation
  • based on markdown, with some additional syntax
  • see code and demo
